text:
@PhilipRucker @gregpmiller @nakashimae Oh yeah it's Trump's fault right? Hmm, what we're them Dems doing in Dec? Impeachment. Jan., impeachment. Trump was briefed late Jan and by 31st banned as much travel from China as possible. But don't take my word for it.
